structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY CLASSIFICATION, BOUNDARIES, AND ALTERNATIVE METHOD OF CONSOLIDATING GOVERNMENTAL SERVICES

law.text: The plan described in KRS 81.300 shall be advertised by the clerk of the fiscal court by publication pursuant to KRS Chapter 424.
law.history: Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 43. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 17, sec. 7.
